message:
Hi Stephen,

This query is regarding Half-open connections. I am creating custom protocol in c++. Followed network programming patterns from [http://dwise1.net/pgm/socke...](http://dwise1.net/pgm/sockets/blocking.html "http://dwise1.net/pgm/sockets/blocking.html") and applied prefixed length encoding! So i use select call in the server side to monitor sockets that i have connected to, to check whether they have data or not! This monitoring happens for timeout period of some seconds. So, is it still necessary to have keep alive mechanism at server side ?
